name: Vi Vadi Hotel

reviews.text: After many years of going to Munich during major trade fairs and paying ridiculous money to stay in a variety of fleapits, I finally found what I was looking for. Simple but spotlessly clean, well positioned hotel that represents great value for money. Hesitate to give it too good a review in case it gets booked up the next time I go there, but frankly the owners deserve it. Service was efficient and courteous, the room - while not large - was more than adequate for a few nights stay. And for even longer has a kitchenette and microwave if you want to pass up the delights of Bavarian cooking. Free wi-fi in the room (unlike some 5-star chains). Nice breakfast in the adjoining Italian restaurant. 5 mins walk equally from the main railway station and the Augustiner Bierkeller. The latter is a true bonus - forget the Hofbrauhaus tourist trap, this is where the locals go to sup Munich's finest beer.
reviews.title: A real find
